response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could significantly impact your life or business. Given its rarity and the efforts put into its creation, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. I trust that you will appreciate its true worth and see the potential it offers. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
